solution_line_template: First find the number of marshmallows Jacob needs: {total_graham_crackers} graham crackers / {graham_crackers_per_smore} graham crackers/marshmallow = <<{total_graham_crackers}/{graham_crackers_per_smore}={marshmallows_needed_for_crackers}>>{marshmallows_needed_for_crackers} marshmallows

Then subtract the number of marshmallows Jacob already has from the number he needs to find the number he needs to buy: {marshmallows_needed_for_crackers} marshmallows - {marshmallows_on_hand} marshmallows = <<{marshmallows_needed_for_crackers}-{marshmallows_on_hand}={marshmallows_to_buy}>>{marshmallows_to_buy} marshmallows
